name: Moral Reason and Economic History
description: A study of the interaction between political philosophy and economic history. The course involves alternative conceptions of the relation between individuals and the community, between the economy and the political order, between what 'is' and what 'ought to be.' [48L] Restrictions: 1) 400-series POL courses are limited to POL Specialists and Joint Specialits; 2) No POL Specialist may take more than 2.0 POL credits at the 400-level (1.0 for Joint Specialists).
